assessment_item.title: BV85CC-Q9-What should be the velocity of a listener moving towards a stationary source so that the frequency of sound may be twice that of its actual value?.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

What should be the velocity of a listener moving towards a stationary source so that the frequency of sound may be twice that of its actual value?.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

330 m s^{-1}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:998"},{"text":"

100 m s^{-1}
